Package group10.client.controller

Class LoginController

java.lang.Object
group10.client.controller.LoginController
All Implemented Interfaces:
FormView, javafx.fxml.Initializable
@Component public class LoginController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable, FormView
Controller class for Login screen. Implements FormView interface
Author:
Alperen Caykus, Mustafa Ozan Alpay
See Also:
FormView

    • userLogIn

      protected void userLogIn​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Callback method of buttonLogin. If form is valid, sends a login request to server and starts spinner. If login is successful, navigates to home page. Otherwise, displays error message.
      Parameters:
      event - Event caused by buttonLogin press.
      See Also:
      buttonLogin

    • navigateToRegister

      protected void navigateToRegister​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Callback method for buttonRegister button. Navigates to register page.
      Parameters:
      event - Event caused by buttonRegister

    • navigateToForgot

      protected void navigateToForgot​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Callback method for forgetPwForwarder hyperlink. Navigates to forgot password page.
      Parameters:
      event - Event caused by forgetPwForwarder hyperlink

    • setErrorMessage

      public void setErrorMessage​(String msg)
      Sets the error message field of the form to given message
      Specified by:
      setErrorMessage in interface FormView
      Parameters:
      msg - Message to be set

    • setSuccessMessage

      public void setSuccessMessage​(String msg)
      Does not have success message as on success, it forwards user to home screen.
      Specified by:
      setSuccessMessage in interface FormView
      Parameters:
      msg - Message to be set
